result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael John Guerin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael John Guerin is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael John Guerin was found guilty of Sex Offender-Fail/Provide Information [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "H" Felony], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(2)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court dismisses Counts 2 and 3.
Court notes 12 days credit.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes: Apply bond on file and refund balance.

-Defendant to continue with Sex Offender requirements.
-Not to possess any firearms.
-Defendant to continue with any programming as recommended by the Agent.
-Defendant to report to the Day Report Center to provide a DNA sample.

timeConds.notes:
-Condition time.
-To be served in increments of 30 days and to be served every year of probation.
-Huber granted for work/seek work.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael John Guerin

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Megan E. Kelly DF ATTY: Christopher Stephen Petros DF: Michael John Guerin appeared. Case called at 3:06. ADA Kelly files an amended Information. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to amended Ct 1  in 15CF337 removing the repeater . DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended Ct 1 in 15CF337 removing the repeater. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Ct 2, 3  in 15CF337 with prejudice. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders a PSI to be completed within the next 60 days. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 16, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Plea hearing on June 7, 2017 at 03:00 pm.
Final pre-trial on May 24, 2017 at 11:15 am.
